LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.ShippingFilter
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to filter out shipping methods in the checkout process. Offers filters for customer roles and countries.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedCustomerRoles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies customer roles for which the shipping method should not be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: ExcludedCountries.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies countries for which the shipping method should not be offered.

LocaleResource.Name: CountryContext.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the address to which the selected countries are related to.
